coffee-pub-artificer.headingH1GettingStarted-Hint: This is the getting started section of the module.
coffee-pub-artificer.headingH4Introduction-Hint: This is the introduction section of the module.
coffee-pub-artificer.headingH2CommonSettings-Hint: This is the common settings section of the module.
coffee-pub-artificer.headingH3JournalSettings-Hint: Configure which journals are used for recipes and blueprints.
coffee-pub-artificer.headingH3CompendiumSettings-Hint: Configure which compendiums to search for ingredients. They are in priority order and we stop looking when we find a match.
coffee-pub-artificer.headingH3ExampleSubheader-Hint: This is an example subheader for the module.
coffee-pub-artificer.recipeJournal-Hint: The journal containing recipe entries. Default: 'Artificer Recipes'
coffee-pub-artificer.blueprintJournal-Hint: The journal containing blueprint entries. Default: 'Artificer Blueprints'
coffee-pub-artificer.numIngredientCompendiums-Hint: Number of compendiums to search for ingredients. Adjust the slider to add or remove priority slots.
coffee-pub-artificer.exampleSetting-Hint: This is an example setting for the module.
